divs: Sighting DetailsMy family was coming home from a firework outing, and as we were waiting at a stop light, I looked into the sky and spotted a red dot. The closer it got, the more we could see the color..it was a reddish orange yellow. As you looked at it, it seemed like it was on fire, flaming. It was moving slowly, and it was a pretty nice size, bigger than a plane. We couldn't believe our eyes, and I swear our voices were raising, we started sweating, and our hearts were pounding. I didn't think to turn on the radio though, to see if there was static. The sight was NOT a normal thing to see, I was so surprised. This is something that I never saw before, and all four of us agreed that it was a UFO. It's funny because the entire time we were watching fireworks, my brother and I were talking about UFOs.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Koppel
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Reddish orange flame in the sky, moving slowly.
